much like the first step this starts

it's going to look darker than it really
is because the particles at the bottom
get dark brown but the butter fat itself
is going to kind of stay a light nutty
brown
color and as soon as it looks like that
I want you to turn off the heat and let

doesn't have to be cool when we add it
it just can't be scorching hot all right
for the rest of the batter we need

that was not smart and I'm also going to

I'm not incorporating much flour just a
little bit and when it looks like that

we're going to quickly pour that in now
if you pour it slow most of the really

and once that's all mixed together
you're done and I know you people love

alright so when it's all mixed it looks

realizing that as it bakes it's really

all right that looks great we are ready

shouldn't be but you never know now very

you're going to Center the plate over

of course allowing all that amazing

pineapple upside-down cake and if
there's any possible way you can let
